-module(diameter_authorization_client).

%%
%%  APIs: https://www.erlang.org/doc/apps/stdlib/gen_statem.html
%%

-behaviour(gen_statem).

-export([
    start/0,
    init/1,
    callback_mode/0,
    handle_event/4,
    code_change/4,
    terminate/3,
    stop/0
]).

%% WARNING: state_functions are not supported by statemachine node.
%% callback_mode() -> state_functions.
callback_mode() -> handle_event_function.

-define(KEEP_STATE(ReplyWith),
    {keep_state, Data, [{reply, From, ReplyWith}]}
).

start() ->
    gen_statem:start({local, ?MODULE}, ?MODULE, [], []).

stop() ->
    gen_statem:stop(?MODULE).
terminate(_Reason, _State, _Data) ->
    void.
code_change(_Vsn, State, Data, _Extra) ->
    {ok, State, Data}.

%% Initial state and data
init([]) ->
    State = idle, 
    Data = 0,
    {ok,State,Data}.

%%% handle event function


%%
%% Definition from 'start' - #e391be61858495a9
%%


%
% Ignoring un-named link to 'idle' - #55a2a011ee5c2445
%


%%
%% Definition from 'Idle' - #55a2a011ee5c2445
%%

handle_event(
    {call, From},
    <<"AAR">>,
    idle,
    Data
) ->
    {next_state, pending, Data, [{ reply, From, ok }]};

%%
%% Definition from 'pending' - #7497b5cde23db3d6
%%

handle_event(
    {call, From},
    {<<"AAA">>, <<"SUCCESS">>},
    pending,
    Data
) ->
    {next_state, open, Data, [{ reply, From, ok }]};
handle_event(
    {call, From},
    {<<"AAA">>, <<"AUTHORISATION_REJECTED">>},
    pending,
    Data
) ->
    {next_state, idle, Data, [{ reply, From, ok }]};

%%
%% Definition from 'open' - #f85143342acaa6a2
%%

handle_event(
    {call, From},
    <<"RAR">>,
    open,
    Data
) ->
    {keep_state, Data, [{ reply, From, ok }]};
handle_event(
    {call, From},
    {<<"AAA">>, <<"MULTI_ROUND_AUTH">>},
    open,
    Data
) ->
    {keep_state, Data, [{ reply, From, ok }]};
handle_event(
    {call, From},
    {<<"AAA">>, <<"SUCCESS">>},
    open,
    Data
) ->
    {keep_state, Data, [{ reply, From, ok }]};
handle_event(
    {call, From},
    {<<"AAA">>, <<"AUTHORISATION_REJECTED">>},
    open,
    Data
) ->
    {next_state, idle, Data, [{ reply, From, ok }]};
handle_event(
    {call, From},
    <<"ASR">>,
    open,
    Data
) ->
    {next_state, disconnected, Data, [{ reply, From, ok }]};

%%
%% Definition from 'disconnected' - #4324a228efde6037
%%

handle_event(
    {call, From},
    <<"STA">>,
    disconnected,
    Data
) ->
    {next_state, done, Data, [{ reply, From, ok }]};

%%
%% Definition from 'done' - #81adf2e8a4251297
%%
                        
                        
%% Fall through
handle_event(
  {call, From},
  _Action,
  _CurrState,
  Data
) ->
    ?KEEP_STATE(ignored);


%%% Absolute fall through
handle_event(EventType, Stiff, State, Data) ->
    io:format("TEST : ~p ~p ~p ~p~n",[EventType, Stiff, State, Data]),
    {keep_state, Data}.
